product_name: Pearl Izumi SELECT Tri Suit - Men's
long_description: Equally at home on short or long triathlon courses, the men's Pearl Izumi SELECT Tri Suit vents, wicks moisture and dries fast so you're always on your best mark. SELECT Transfer Dry fabric sets the benchmark for compression and moisture transfer. Direct-Vent panels excel at ventilation. Flatlock seams provide superior abrasion resistance. 12 in. zipper allows excellent venting options. Plush elastic silicone leg grippers hold shorts in place comfortably. TRI quick-dry fleece chamois. 1 easy-access envelope pocket. Pearl Izumi SELECT Tri Suit for men offers reflective elements for low-light visibility.
short_description: Equally at home on short or long triathlon courses, the men's Pearl Izumi SELECT Tri Suit vents, wicks moisture and dries fast so you're always on your best mark.
